post:
[TRUNKSPACEHOSTING.COM](http://www.trunkspacehosting.com)

VPS offered out of 2 datacenter locations in the USA:

VPS datacenter #1 - ServerComplete DC out of Jacksonville, Florida, USA  
Test IPv4: 107.155.131.3  
Test file: http://lg.as19531.net/1GB.test  
Looking glass: http://lg.as19531.net

VPS datacenter #2 - NeedaServer DC out of Los Angeles, California, USA  
Test IPv4: 66.117.10.106 or 66.117.10.110  
(optimized transit for traffic to ASIA)

Node Information:  
- Jacksonville, Florida: Dual Xeon X5650, 48GB DDR3 ECC RAM, 4x 1TB (H/W RAID10)  
- Los Angeles, California: Dual Xeon X5650, 48GB DDR3 ECC RAM, 2x 2TB (H/W RAID1)

Offer:  
- 1 CPU Core @ 2.00+ GHz  
- 1GB DDR3 Memory  
- 25GB Diskspace  
- 1TB/mth Bandwidth  
- IPv4: 1 IP (additional IP @ $3.00USD/mth)  
- Full root access, self-management via SolusVM control panel  
**$3.96/mth** using coupon code: [LETOCT2016](https://www.trunkspacehosting.com/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=29&promocode=LETOCT2016)  

Purchase: [Order Link](https://www.trunkspacehosting.com/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=29&promocode=LETOCT2016)
